## writeFileList() function

write a list to a file

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function writeFileList(path: string, list: readonly string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> | path to write the file to |
|  list | <code>readonly string[]</code> | string list to write to the file |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
